original_text: “Speak to the people of Israel, saying, If any one of you or of your descendants is unclean through touching a dead body, or is on a long journey, he shall still keep the Passover to the Lord.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르라 너희나 너희 후손 중에 시체로 말미암아 부정하게 되든지 먼 여행 중에 있다 할지라도 다 여호와 앞에 마땅히 유월절을 지키되

sentences.original_text: Speak to the people of Israel,
If any one of you or of your descendants
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 누구든지 또는 너희 후손이

sentences.original_text: is unclean through touching a dead body,
or is on a long journey,
he shall still keep the Passover to the Lord.
